column1: Table 2. Basal area and soil and leaf nutrients across a Mean Annual Precipitation (MAP) gradient for Acacia koa stands at 1600–1650 m elevation. Mean ± SE. Values within a row followed by the same letter do not differ significantly (P < 0.05). HONO = Honomalino Forest; HAVO = Hawaii Volcanoes National Park; KR = Keauhou Ranch.
